trans-unit.source: Specifies a rotation transformation.
trans-unit.target: 指定旋轉轉換。

trans-unit.source: Rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] usually consist of two arguments: a point around which to rotate an object or set of objects, and a value in degrees or radians that determines the amount of rotation.
trans-unit.target: 中的旋轉[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]通常是由兩個引數： 點繞著旋轉的物件或一組物件，而在中度或弧度為單位的值，決定的旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)], it is necessary to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> rather than a point around which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]，它就必須指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>而不是周圍旋轉的點。

trans-unit.source: Rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] become more complicated when they are animated.
trans-unit.target: 中的旋轉[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)]變得更複雜，當它們有動畫效果。

trans-unit.source: To animate a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] rotation using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, you can animate the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Angle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Axis%2A> properties of an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>, or specify a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D> for the transform..
trans-unit.target: 若要動畫方式顯示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)]旋轉使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>，您可以動畫顯示<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Angle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Axis%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>，或指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.QuaternionRotation3D>轉換...

trans-unit.source: Axis/angle rotations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] are specified in degrees, not radians.
trans-unit.target: 中的軸/角度旋轉[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)]以度為單位，不弧度為單位指定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 指定旋轉的 Rotation3D。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> class with the specified rotation.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的旋轉，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 指定旋轉的 Rotation3D。

trans-unit.source: Center of the transformation's rotation.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的旋轉中心。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> class with the specified center and rotation.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的中心和旋轉，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 指定旋轉的 Rotation3D。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the X value about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Double，指定要做為旋轉中心的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the Y value about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Double，指定要做為旋轉中心的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the Z value about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Double，指定要做為旋轉中心的 Z 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> class uusing the specified rotation and center coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的旋轉和中心座標，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要做為旋轉中心之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: Double that represents the X coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Double，表示要做為旋轉中心之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following code uses this property to change the point around which a RotateTransform3D transforms the model.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會使用這個屬性來變更周圍 RotateTransform3D 轉換之模型的點。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterX" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterX" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要做為旋轉中心之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Double that represents the Y coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Double，表示要做為旋轉中心之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following code uses this property to change the point around which a RotateTransform3D transforms the model.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會使用這個屬性來變更周圍 RotateTransform3D 轉換之模型的點。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterY" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterY" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Z coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要做為旋轉中心之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: Double that represents the Z coordinate of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Double，表示要做為旋轉中心之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: The following code uses this property to change the point around which a RotateTransform3D transforms the model.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會使用這個屬性來變更周圍 RotateTransform3D 轉換之模型的點。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterZ" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.CenterZ" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D" /> that specifies the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定旋轉的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Rotation3D that specifies an angle of rotation about an axis.
trans-unit.target: Rotation3D 會指定軸的旋轉角度。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> that represents the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取表示旋轉的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that represents the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示旋轉的 Matrix3D。
